system.help: The base framework for developping object oriented Drupal modules
system.menu_admin_description: Configures various aspects of the Drupal Object Oriented Programming Framework

settings.html_format_description: Format all HTML output from the OOP modules, to get a cleaner source.
settings.email_crypt_symbol_description: The symbol to use as a substitute of the @ symbol in the email crypt methods. You will probably have to clear the cache after having changed this value.
settings.default_language_description: The default language for the Oop_Lang_Getter class, used in every OOP modules to get the language labels. You should probably leave the default value as most of the OOP modules should be written in english.
